attributes.action: Assist the British public and ease the peoples debt situation
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Prime Minister should announce that as from 1st November 2008 all lenders of money will not charge more than 5% over the Bank rate for a period of 2 years.
For this to include existing loans, borrowing and credit cards.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
